title: UFC : leading fighter earning totals as of May 2019
yAxis: Total earnings in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Total earnings in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Total earnings in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month Conor McGregor and lowest at Month Frank Mir.
The difference of Total earnings in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 8.51.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Total earnings in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Total earnings in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month Conor McGregor and lowest at Month Frank Mir.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Total earnings in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Total earnings in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month Conor McGregor and lowest at Month Frank Mir.
The difference of Total earnings in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 8.51.
max_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Total earnings in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
Month Conor McGregor has the highest Total earnings in million U.S. dollars and Frank Mir has the lowest Total earnings in million U.S. dollars.
Month Alistair Overeem has the second highest value for Total earnings in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Month Conor McGregor has 8.51 more Total earnings in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Frank Mir.
Month Conor McGregor is higher than any other Months with value 12.02, followed by Alistair Overeem, and Anderson Silva. Down to Month Frank Mir with the lowest value 3.51.
Over the past 30 Months, the Total earnings in million U.S. dollars has reduced.
Month Stipe Miocic, and Chris Weidman have the same Total earnings in million U.S. dollars.
The lowest value 3.51 at Frank Mir is almost 2.32 times smaller than the average value 5.18.
